Welcome to
@nycopportunity/generationnyc-patterns v1.0.0-1

NYC teens and young adults can find help with navigating City resources, including a variety of topics, trips, and inspirational youth profiles.


Primary Button

Source: src/elements/buttons/buttons

The button pattern can be used to style <button></button> and <a></a> as a trigger to perform an action or navigate to another page.

Demonstration

Markup

<div class="text-center mx-4">
  <button class="btn btn--primary">
    <span>Submit</span>
  </button>
</div>

Secondary Button

Demonstration

Markup

<div class="bg-black p-4 text-center mx-4">
  <button class="btn btn--secondary">
    <span>Submit</span>
  </button>
</div>

Tertiary Button

Demonstration

Markup

<div class="text-center mx-4">
  <button class="btn btn--tertiary bg-green-light">
    <span>Submit</span>
  </button>
</div>

Pill Button

Source: src/elements/buttons/button--pill

The pill button is primarily used for taxonomies.

Demonstration

Markup

<div class="text-center mx-4">
  <button class="btn btn--pill">
    <span>Tag</span>
  </button>
</div>

Round Button

Demonstration

Back to top

Markup

<div class="text-center mx-4 flex items-center justify-center">
  <a class="btn btn--round" href="#main">
    <span>Back to top</span>
  </a>
</div>
